Statute.Title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development Agreement Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord portant création de la Banque européenne pour la reconstruction et le développement, Loi sur l’)

Schedule.Label: Sch.
Schedule.Text: 2006, c. 4, s. 215, SOR/2012-81, s. 1 (Agreement art. 1) and SOR/2012-81, s. 2 (Agreement art. 18)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1991, c. 12 in force on assent 01.02.91
CIF, 1993, c. 34, s. 66 in force on assent 23.06.93
CIF, 1999, c. 26, s. 49 in force on assent 17.06.99
CIF, 2006, c. 4, ss. 214 and 215 in force on assent 22.06.2006

CIF, SOR/2012-81, s. 1 in force 12.09.2013, being 7 days after the day of the formal communication see s. 3(1); s. 2 in force 22.08.2012, being 7 days after the day of the formal communication referred to in par. see s. 3(2)
CIF, 2024, c. 17, s. 175 in force on assent 20.06.2024
